results.name: Retro Future Runner for Arturia Pigments
Disco Elysium - The Final Cut Bundle

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8 or 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-12600 / AMD Ryzen 3 3100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 470 / Radeon RX 570
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-13700 / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 Ti / Radeon RX 5500 XT
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: intelCore2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Directx 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • Storage: 350 MB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Steam OS, Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB, Vulkan
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Local coop requires an additional gamepad.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB, DirectX 11, OpenGL Core 4.3 or Vulkan
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Local coop requires an additional gamepad. Wheel controllers might cause issues.

Minimum:

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB Memory, ATI HD5650 or better
